A

action - Variable in class ca.techgarage.scrubians.npcs.NpcRegistry.DialogueData.DialogueOptionData
Action IDs -- 'close' closes the dialogue - 'next' proceeds to next page - {Integer pageNumber} Sets the page to the page number provoded - 'run_{command spaces replaced with _}' This allows any command to be ran PLEASE do not allow non-trusted users to have access (possible force-op).
addOption(NPCDialogue.DialogueOption) - Method in class ca.techgarage.scrubians.dialogue.NPCDialogue.DialoguePage
 
addPage(String) - Method in class ca.techgarage.scrubians.dialogue.NPCDialogue
Add a simple text page
addPageWithOptions(String, NPCDialogue.DialogueOption...) - Method in class ca.techgarage.scrubians.dialogue.NPCDialogue
Add a page with clickable options
addWaypoint(int, NpcRegistry.Waypoint) - Static method in class ca.techgarage.scrubians.npcs.NpcRegistry
Add waypoint.
addWaypoint(Vec3d) - Method in class ca.techgarage.scrubians.npcs.PathEditorSession
Add a waypoint at the player's current position
addWaypoint(Vec3d, int) - Method in class ca.techgarage.scrubians.npcs.PathEditorSession
Add a waypoint with custom wait time
